DOC.brief_summary: The goal propose research complete development web-based program train Employee Assistance Program ( EAP ) EAP-affiliated manage behavioral health organization ( MBHO ) practitioner conduct screening , brief intervention , referral treatment ( SBIRT ) problem alcohol use among work adult .
DOC.brief_title: Web-Based Training EAP Alcohol Screening , Brief Intervention , Refer
DOC.detailed_description: In Phase 2 , investigator propose develop SBIRT Training & Support Tool two component : ( 1 ) online SBIRT Training call-center face-to-face practitioner conduct alcohol SBIRT ( 2 ) SBIRT Support Tool mobile/web interactive alcohol screening tool brief intervention protocol facilitate use SBIRT practitioner . The SBIRT Training component provide practitioner skill , knowledge , motivation , self-efficacy : ( ) screen client unhealthy alcohol use validate screening tool ; ( b ) provide brief , motivational interviewing-informed intervention ; ( c ) make appropriate referral . The training program incorporate Phase 1 content expand curriculum include use additional validated alcohol screening tool . Content alcohol SBIRT derive NIAAA evidence-based material . The SBIRT Support Tool provide mobile/web interface practitioner use interactive screening brief intervention form ( ) prompt validate question screen brief intervention ; ( b ) motivational interviewing-informed dialogue suggestion ; ( c ) online resource ( i.e. , standard drink list ; importance , confidence ruler ) ; ( ) alcohol education referral information . The practitioner use SBIRT Support Tool ( ) screen client alcohol use interactive validate screening tool ; ( b ) provide brief intervention individual base screen score ; ( c ) provide referral treatment individual base screen score .
DOC.criteria: EAP/BH practitioner employ EAP behavioral health organization email account access highspeed Internet connection speak read English young 18 EAP practitioner access email access Internet speak read English
